title: Longest Consecutive Sequence

description.en: Find the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence.
description.zh-CN: [题目128] Find the length of the longest consecutive element...
description.zh-TW: [題目128] Find the length of the longest consecutive element...
description.ja: [問題128] Find the length of the longest consecutive element...
description.es: [Problema 128] Find the length of the longest consecutive element...
description.de: [Problem 128] Find the length of the longest consecutive element...
description.fr: [Problème 128] Find the length of the longest consecutive element...

explanation.en: APL solution for Longest Consecutive Sequence. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses reduction (/) to aggregate values: +/ sums, ×/ multiplies, ⌈/ finds max, ⌊/ finds min. Uses unique (∪) to remove duplicate elements. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Longest Consecutive Sequence 的 APL 解决方案。使用等级 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回将对数组排序的索引。使用归约 (/) 聚合值：+/ 求和，×/ 相乘，⌈/ 找最大值，⌊/ 找最小值。使用 unique (∪) 去除重复元素。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Longest Consecutive Sequence 的 APL 解決方案。使用等級 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回將對陣列排序的索引。使用歸約 (/) 聚合值：+/ 求和，×/ 相乘，⌈/ 找最大值，⌊/ 找最小值。使用 unique (∪) 去除重複元素。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。

Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
